title: Bayesian Network Variable Elimination
description: A Python implementation of the Variable Elimination algorithm for probabilistic inference in Bayesian Networks. Demonstrates efficient computation of marginal probabilities through factor operations.

title: Sudoku Solver
description: A comprehensive Sudoku solver implementing both backtracking and constraint propagation algorithms. Features puzzle generation, difficulty levels, and visualization of the solving process.

title: Four in a Row AI Game
description: A Python implementation of the classic Four in a Row game featuring an AI opponent using the Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning for optimal moves.

title: Frozen Lake RL Solver
description: A reinforcement learning solution for OpenAI's FrozenLake environment using Q-Learning, demonstrating fundamental AI concepts in a grid-world navigation challenge.
